message:
Hello freshers! Looking for something productive to do this summers sitting at home?
Well, we have just the right opportunity for you.
Join the Online Summer Training Program by Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and get an opportunity to be a part of the Spring Fest 2020 Web Team.
Register at: www.springfest.in/webselections

A big Thank You to Gaana for associating with us to successfully conclude the Diamond Edition.

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur, proudly presents 9stacks Gaming as its Official Poker Partner. Poker Night of free roll live tournament for the very first time in Campus. Grab the opportunity of winning a total cash prize of guaranteed INR 30,000. Lots of goodies and incentives by 9stacks are awaiting your presence.

 Be there at the Badminton court sharp at 11pm!

#SpringFest_19

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur welcomes Dr Rosalind Pearmain as the Guest Speaker on 27th January in V4.
Dr. Rosalind Pearmain has been practising and sharing Heartfulness as a trainer for more than thirty-five years. She has worked in education throughout her life on aspects of empowerment and transformation for women, teenagers, children, adults.

The registrations for the much-awaited Microsoft Training/ Internship Program are open now!  National level Internship Program!!
The internship offers from different tied up companies based on your performance.

• Opportunity to be Mentored by Industry leaders 
* Get MTA certificate signed by Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella  
• Opportunity to work on Major and Minor Projects mentored by the  Trainers
• Gaining access to exclusive course content, etc., as part of the course.
• Total of 2 projects, one major and one minor will be completed by the students under Mentor supervision.
• Intern courses offered are *Machine learning with Python, *Web development, Cloud computing, IoT(Internet of things)Etc
*Training will be online/offline 

Mentorship on every Sunday in nearest locations if you opt for online
*Internship’s will be provided after the training.
*Last Date of Registration- Feb-5th 

*Register here: http://verzeo.in/

If you are Interested please the form 
https://goo.gl/XaHmLx

For more details about this program reach it to us 
 *+91-6362391201

The World Championship Qualifiers for Red Bull Mind Gamers Escape Room is now in India, and the next stop is Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur.

Dates: 24th to 27th January 2019
Timing: 10:00am to 7:00pm

Do you think your team is game enough to clock the fastest time? The winning team gets an opportunity to represent the country at the global finals.

Red Bull Mind Gamers Escape Room challenges out-of-the-box thinkers and logical decision makers to come together to crack puzzles created by the world-renowned game's designer, Dr. Scott Nicholson.

#SpringFest_19
#redbull

Remember the times when you loved going to your grandparents’ village in your childhood? Panch Parmeshwar is all set to drive your nostalgia away bringing to you some of those funny and interesting situations which you encountered in your village.

सही और गलत के पार, 
बरगद के पेड़ तले,
मुकदमों को सुलझाते हुए,
पंच परमेश्वर है,
हम वहीं मिलेंगे।

Panch Parmeshwar is a fun event in which two teams are provided with a slightly complex & funny case [Depicting a situation of a village] to fight on verbally in front of the panchayat of the village. The team presenting more funny and relevant arguments is decided to be the winner. Be there in front of the HSS department on 25th January, 10 am onwards to have a burst of laughter and loads of fun.

#SpringFest_19

So prepare to lose all your inhibitions for a wild night, and rave to the most awesome EDM mixes ever at the most happening place only at Spring Fest.

Adding up to the breath-taking lineup, we present you the famous Indian playback singer Shalmali Kholgade as the second act of Coca-Cola presents - Anubhav at Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur.

Shalmali is known for songs like Pareshaan, Balam Pichkari and Lat lag gayee, and she also celebrates independent music along with her playback singing career in Bollywood.

See you all on 25th of January at Pronites Ground.
Thank You Eminence Group Of Entertainment and Artist Aadmi

As you click some amazing pictures, we bring you a competition where you can showcase your amazing clicks along with a chance to win Xiaomi Smart Bands and Powerbanks from Mi India!

Spring Fest presents "Roti, Rasta aur India - An Online Street Food Photography Competition" powered by Xiaomi. Send us the picture of the most lip-smacking piece of food you came across this winter.

Send the picture to foodfestival.sf19@gmail.com with the following details:
1. Name
2. Phone Number
3. College Name
4.Name of the street food which is in the picture

Judging will be done on the basis of the picture getting the most number of likes, shares, and comments. 

Deadline: 22nd January 2019 11:59 PM

Here's the announcement you've all been waiting for. Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and Mivi proudly present the most versatile singing sensation of Bollywood, KK for the final pronite, Pal!

Having scored a number of successful soundtracks like Khuda Jaane,Tu Jo Mila, Party on my mind, Aashaayen , Alvida in the past years, the magical artist is a massive hit across the country. See you on the 27th of January at Pronites Ground as KK is all set to blast the stage with his thrilling performance.

Get ready to witness him perform live at Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and be a part of the most memorable evening of the season.
Thank you, Eminence Group Of Entertainment & Artist Aadmi

As the first act of our Global Music Festival, we are delighted to present to you Sophie von Matérn
Sophie is a singer-songwriter from Sweden who with her heart opening music travels and sings all over the world. She has opened up on stage for the famous rapper 50 Cent in the U.S., been singing at an award ceremony in the U.K. and performed at Sweden’s largest stadium - Ullevi, with an attendance of 60,000 people, to name a few. 
She will now come to India to bring us the gift and presence of her soul and give us a performance filled with meaningful lyrics and beautiful deep messages for our hearts to receive. 
Be there to witness her dazzling voice as she enters the stage and stuns us all. 

Visit her website:
www.sophievonmatern.com 

#SF_19
#GlobalMusicFestival 
#DiamondEdition

Hello Folks!
At this point, almost everything is on the table with regards to Avengers: Endgame, and every marvel fan has his/her own theory about the plot. So we have an event for all the superheroes and marvel fans out there.
Following are the rules:-
1- Comment below on "what might be the plot of Avengers 4"
2- Every participant needs to write the plot in 2-3 lines.
3- In the same comment, tag your 2 friends.
4- The comment with the maximum reacts until 8th Jan wins.

All the best.
#SF_19

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur in association with the Shankar Mahadevan Academy is back with its solo singing competition, SF Idol powered by Songdew.

Registrations open until 30th December, 2018.

The wait for India’s oldest and most prestigious rock band competition is now over as Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur presents Wildfire 2019 in association with Songdew,  Sofar Sounds Kolkata and Swarnabhoomi Academy of Music, Chennai. Wildfire, with a cash prize of INR 1,00,000 and prizes worth INR 5,00,000 has always been followed closely by all rock enthusiasts around the country. 
So, tune your guitar, clear your throat and register for Wildfire at 
https://www.springfest.in/wildfire/

Stay tuned to our page for further updates on the event.

message:
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur hitch-hiked all the way to Pune for the Nation Wide Prelims on 21st October. Here are the results.

SF Idol:-
1. Harshraj Jadhao
2. Samruddhi Ingle
3. Mudassar Patel

Shake a Leg:-
1. Pranavraj Sadakale
2. Anirudh Joshi
3. Ayushi Sharma

Two For a Tango:-
1. Insync (Raunak Mall and Bhavani Shankar)

Shuffle:-
1. The Forbidden Kingdom

Nukkad:-
1. AFMC Nukkad Team

message:
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur hitch-hiked all the way to the capital city for the Nation Wide Prelims on 21st October. Here are the results.

Nukkad:
1. NSIT
2. SGND
3. VIPS
 
SF Idol:
1. Abhinandan Menon, Shiv Nadar University
2. Farmaan, Amity
3. Pranshu Kukreti, DTU

SAL:
1. Karan Rathi, FIMT
2. Ramnika Jain, ABESIT
3. Himanshu, Shyamlal College

TFAT:
1. Vaibhav and Mansi, Kirorimal College
2. Pavan and Yashwant, Kirorimal College
3. Kunal and Dinesh, Ravenshaw University

Shuffle:
1. Aarodhya western Dance crew, Shyamlal College
2. Zest, Dyal Singh
3. Steppers, KIET

They may not always smell pure and sweet,
A dirty diaper or a dampened sheet.
But with a loving cuddle and a beautiful smile,
The joys of parenthood are all worth while.
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur wishes everyone a Happy Children's Day.
#childrensday

Yo Bhubaneswar!
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur presents Hitch Hike: The Eliminations for the events Hilarity Ensues and Poetry Slam on 11th November at BREWBERRYs Bhubaneswar in association with The Chain Jokers, Bhubaneswar Poetry Club and BakeShake. Those who can prove their mettle would make it straight to the finals at IIT Kharagpur. So the mic is open for you to set the stage on fire, don't miss it!

#HitchHikeEliminations

"Sometimes You Never Know The Value Of A Moment Until It Becomes A Memory." – Dr. Seuss
 For the first time in KGP Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur presents Prom Night, a night filled with dance, music and romance. It's time to approach your special one and make memories you never want to lose.
The registration starts at 8:00 PM, 23rd October at goo.gl/is1Xmp
Limited Entries only.

Hello I'm your heart.
I beat 100,000 times a day and 36 million times a year.
With each beat I pump approx. 200 ml of blood at the rate of 80 beats a minute.
I send 4 to 6 litres of blood a distance of 100,000 km through your vessel system at the rate of 1,440 times a day.
Please take good care of me.
Do what it takes to start to have a healthy heart.

#WorldHeartDay
#SpringFest_19

Design Credits : Kavana Rao

message:
उन्माद से भरे अलंकार का कोना-कोना, 
जब हार-जीत बन जाए कुछ पाना-कुछ खोना,
बोलने लगे जब कंठ 
एहसासों की वाणी 
बोलो कौन सी भाषा लगेगी तुमको सबसे प्यारी,
जिसमें बचपन का सौंदर्य निराला लगता है,
जिसमें अग्रज का समझाना प्यारा लगता है,
जिसमें गीतों का संसार हमारा लगता है,
जिसमें किस्से-कहानियों का दरबार सायना लगता है।
तुम अंग्रेजी में पूछो 
मैं तत्सम उसे बना लूंगा
सिर्फ़ किताबों का अभिमान नहीं है हिंदी 
मेरे दिल का मान है हिंदी 
मेरे हिन्द का सम्मान है हिंदी।
स्प्रिंग फेस्ट की तरफ़ से आप सभी को हिंदी दिवस की शुभकामनाएं।

Design Credits - Nipurn Sarbhai

message:
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur invites applications for the position of Campus Ambassador for the diamond jubilee of the fest. Interested to be a part of one of the biggest college festivals in the country? So here it is! 

Spread the word about Spring Fest in your college to earn an official certificate and set yourself apart from the crowd. Loads of goodies up for grabs!!

To register yourself as a Campus Ambassador, visit https://ca.springfest.in/ now

#CampusAmbassador
#SpringFest_19

Here's Bill. And his friend,Sam.
Sam spends about 20 hours a day sleeping, and the rest of the time eating. Bill wakes him up for class.
Your friend spends roughly the same amount of time eating and sleeping. And then you wake him up for class, too.
Do you know what else Bill and you have in common?
Bill wishes Sam/all his friends a happy Friendship Day today.
So will you, right?
Here's wishing you a Happy Friendship Day from your friends at Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur!
Design Credits:- Aarushi Gupta
#HappyFriendshipDay

Homecoming. A new beginning.
The heavy rain and the sweltering heat, and all the familiar faces who welcome you back to college. Late-night bhaat sessions, "birthday wali" treats, and the beauty of your home away from home.
Welcome to your second family.

Farewell. A sorrowful goodbye. And a new beginning.
Fond memories to accompany you as you step towards a new, bright start. 
Your family wishes you all the luck for your future.

We at Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur, welcome you to KGP.

message:
Did you know that if you're a woman, or a person who purchases personal care products marketed to women, you're probably paying more than your male counterparts simply because you're a woman? It's a sneaky phenomenon dubbed the "pink tax." 
The pink tax is the idea that companies charge women more for personal care products simply because they will pay more.
#tampon_tax
#pink_tax
#SpringFest_19

Football season is here! 
Is just seeing the GOATs and the lions tear apart the world stage not enough for you? Do you want to show off your inner Messi and your inner Cristiano?
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur brings you the opportunity to do so, and earn great prizes, by showing us your football skills!
Send us your videos at online.events.sf19@gmail.com by 3rd July, and the top 3 entries will win cool prizes!

A father is a guide, a teacher, and a friend to his child. He is the man who loves his children enough to allow them to make mistakes so that they can learn a lesson from them.
And how many times have we had friends in our lives, elder siblings and cousins, who have done the same for us? Our fathers away from home, who give us invaluable life advice, relationship tips and the night canteen treats.

So on the occasion of Father's Day, celebrate your Dost Wala Dad and remind all your sons for whom you have ever acted as a dad to wish you back.

#fatherhood
#superdaddy 
#SpringFest_19

Every year, 14 June is celebrated as the World Blood Donor Day. The event serves to raise awareness of the need for safe blood and to thank blood donors for their voluntary, life-saving gifts.
Transfusion of blood and blood products saves millions of lives every year. Patients suffering from life threatening diseases are given a new lease at life, by the kindness of the brave donors, who save many lives every day.
So come join us at Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur, as we celebrate these real life superheroes.
Be there for someone else. Give blood. Share life.
#DonateBloodDonateLife
#GiveBlood
#SpringFest_2019

"One of the greatest satisfactions in our work here at the studio is the warm relationship that exists within our cartoon family. Mickey, Pluto, Goofy, and the whole gang have always been a lot of fun to work with. But like many large families, we have a problem child. You're right, it's Donald Duck."--- Walt Disney.
Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur wishes you and your roommates a very Happy Donald Duck Day.
#DonaldDuckDay

message:
To all the mothers out there proudly, and silently, carrying the weight of happy families on their shoulders, the watchful protectors and the constant guardians. To all the real-life superheroes, Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur wishes you a Happy Mother's Day!

"From being the resolute hand that always pushed us ahead, every time we felt ourselves faltering, to the watchful eyes that always awaited our knock on the door, after a long day of books and tiring examinations; the kind, loving words that soothed us so much more than the homemade lemonade that you kept ready for us. As time strays past us and the hours of separation turn into dreaded months of distance, poignant phone exchanges replace the quiet, twilit conversations about life, love and our future, that we used to have. But that portrait in our heart never gathers dust, that face sculpted in our memory shall be forever our shining beacon of comfort and reliable support.
I wish I could tell you this in person, Ma, on every day of the year instead of just one. But with the magical power of peering into my heart, and unfolding my deepest fears that you seem to have forever possessed, you must already know how I feel, don't you?
I love you, Ma. Thank you, for turning my costume-clad fantasies to reality.
Happy mother's day."

message:
"Some people come into our lives, leave footprints on our hearts and imprint on our soul."
It was a day of great sorrow when Veeral Sheth, the Sponsorship and Marketing Head, SF 2018 left for his heavenly abode yesterday leaving all of us in shock and dismay. His life was a blessing, a motivation and a memory that will forever be treasured by his friends and family. He touched the lives of many people around him. To say that Veeral Sheth was an absolute gem would be an understatement. Brimming with enthusiasm, he was the spark that motivated us, held us together and now that spark is no more.

Team Spring Fest pays its condolences to Veeral’s friends and family. There is and will be no other Veeral in our lives. You will be missed Veeral, every single day.

Stay Safe. Stay Happy.
Rest in Peace VS!

message: British Council, our knowledge partner, invites you to join the Digital Library. The digital library is a premium repository of books, journals, movies, live theatre, magazines, newspapers, soft skills training modules, musical concerts and much more.  Students receive a special discount of Rs200 on the annual subscription. Offer is valid for the first 100 registrations. To register, visit https://library.britishcouncil.org.in and use promo code FAMKOL to get the Rs200 discount.’

Pictures are worth a thousand words and a million emotions.
And thus Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and OnePlus present, A Picture Tale, a professional photo story event in association with Indian Institute of Photography, Foto Unit and Teach For India.

With INR 10,000 up for grabs, this is the perfect excuse for every photography enthusiast out there to capture moments, sublime glances and unforgettable moments and weave them all into an elaborate and enticing story-line.

The three themes to be followed are:-
1.My Campus Story
2.Abstract Composition
3.Truth and Hope

#SpringFest2018
#FilmFest

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and Nomura present guest lecture by Laxmi Agarwal, an Indian campaigner with Stop Acid Attacks. She is an acid attack survivor and speaks for the rights of acid attack victims. Currently, she is the director of Chhanv Foundation, a NGO dedicated to help the survivors of acid attacks in India. Laxmi received a 2014 International Women of Courage award by US First Lady Michelle Obama. She was also chosen as the NDTV Indian of the Year.

Be there on 26th of January, Kalidas Auditorium.

#Umang

The days of Spring Fest are filled with enthusiasm and energy with lots of chances to make new friends and enjoy! But we at Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur with help from SilentOwl have taken an oath to bring life to your nights as well and make this Spring Fest 2018 the best days of your life as we introduce for the first time 'Silent Disco'.

The days of Spring Fest are filled with enthusiasm and energy with lots of chances to make new friends and enjoy! Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur has always been a platform for all Dramatics enthusiasts from all over the nation. With a flow of passion, emotions and energy, our events Nukkad, Rangmanch and I Me Myself have always been extraordinary to witness. 

Here is a glimpse of the same. So gear up for this Spring Fest by registering at www.springfest.in 
Video Credits: Raman Shaw

The wait is over as Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur announces it's last pronite Pal, the Bollywood Nite starring the sensational voice Shaan, sponsored by Hero MotoCorp. Having sung Main Hoon Don, Where's The Party Tonight, It's The Time To Disco, Dus Bahane, Deewangi, Shaan is one of the Bollywood's favorite voices. Bring out your dance shoes to party on 28th January as Shaan rocks the Spring Fest 2018 finale!

A big shout to the Eminence Group Of Entertainment for working tirelessly towards it to make it happen.

#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and OnePlus presents Shutter Up, an online theme photography competition, in association with Indian Institute of Photography. 
Send 5-10 photos clicked on or after 20th January 2018, based on the following themes on photography.sf18@gmail.com. The themes are: 1) Harmony, 2) Portrait, 3) Nature. Winners get a chance to avail free online course on photography from Indian Institute of Photography worth INR 50,000 each, and goodies worth over INR 10,000.

#SpringFest2018
#Photography

Are you a cricket enthusiast? If yes, then this is an event you surely don't want to miss. Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and Kolkata Knight Riders bring to you Mock Auction! Form a team of 4 with your friends and participate to win exclusive merchandise and get a chance to watch a KKR game. 

To register, fill the form below-

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfEnXuU27Dfp79plihjW09tocZ5faHM17PLjagibBRxcaWBJA/viewform?c=0&w=1

Shortlisted teams get to participate in the auction directly!
Be there on 25th January at Kalidas Auditorium to win exciting goodies as this event will be screened on Star Sports network.

#SpringFest2018

For the first time ever, Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur in association with FilterCopy introduces a new event in the genre of Film Fest, named as the ‘Youtube Fest’, where we invite budding YouTubers and upcoming media bodies to come here at Spring Fest, take advantage of the crazy environment and enthusiastic crowd to make the most entertaining YouTube video you can think of! This one of a kind event allows the participating teams to make the video of their choice, it can be a social experiment, a prank video or even a youth oriented scripted video. The only thing to keep in mind is that the video has to be set in Spring Fest and should depict in a very entertaining way the atmosphere at the fest. 

Cash prize worth INR 10,000 at stake. The winning entry to be promoted by Filtercopy on it's social media along with exciting goodies and merchandise!
Register at : http://springfest.in

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur announces the final act of Street Carnival - Mr Murray Molloy, the sword swallower from Spain. One of the very few sword swallowers that can swallow curved swords and multiple swords at once! 
Murray Molloy has been performing and traveling all over the world from Australia to Laos and Portugal to Fiji, for more than fifteen years and now he is coming to Spring Fest 2018 to bring your hearts to your mouth with his daring and awe-inspiring feats!

Here's the announcement you've all been waiting for. Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and MRF Tyres proudly present the music composer duo, Sachin Jigar, headlining Anubhav!

Having scored a number of successful soundtracks like Saibo, Char Baj Gae, Baba Ji Ki Booti, Afeemi in the last few years, the magical duo has become a massive hit across the country. See you on the 26th of January at Pronites Ground as Sachin Jigar are all set to blast the stage with their thrilling performance.

Thank you, Eminence Group Of Entertainment.

#SpringFest2018
#Anubhav

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and Nomura present Guest Lecture by Sh. Rajat Sharma. Popular for his famous talk show ‘Aap Ki Adalat’, Rajat Sharma is Chairman and Editor-in Chief of India TV. He has been bestowed one of India’s highest civilian honors, “The Padma Bhushan Award”. Rajat Sharma, who has been equated with Jeremy Paxman by Britain’s Guardian News Paper, has put over 800 personalities in the ‘dock’ on his show.
Be there on the 28th to hear him talk about his life experiences.

#GuestLecture

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur along with Bengal Energy Limited and Inshorts present Penathlon, the online creative writing event, in association with Write India.
You can submit your entry on any one of the following themes with a word limit of 2000 words to penathlon.sf18@gmail.com.

1. Media, both informative and social, should be held accountable for the veracity of information propagated by/through it.
2. All cryptocurrencies should be banned.
3. Man Booker Prize should be decided by popular vote.

With a Cash Prize of INR 7000 up for grabs. Let your thoughts flow free and your words shape perspectives!

#SpringFest2018

To know more about Rangmanch, head over to www.springfest.in

Spring Fest in association with Spreading Hope presents the Organ Donation and Transplant awareness camp. Spreading Hope is working towards getting 10 million conscientious individuals to knowingly and accountably pledge their organs, thereby saving 100,000 lives over the next 5 years.

The mission of "Spreading Hope" is being launched with a drive from Pondicherry to Ladhakh from 1st August 2017, through 9 cities and surrounding rural areas. Here is the teaser for the drive which was conducted last year.

 https://www.facebook.com/lourdofthedance/posts/932838420207641 

Be there at Spring Fest 2018 to become a register as a doner and be a part of this social cause.

Save up to 8 lives and more by pledging to be an organ donor on www.spreadinghope.in

#spreadinghopefoundation #savelives #organdonor #lourdofthedance #lourdvijay #SpringFest

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur & OnePlus in association with The Storygraphers presents SFM - the short film-making competition.

Make a short film on any one of the following themes:
1. The Quest 
2. Madness
3. Superhero
and submit your entries at filmfestival.sf18@gmail.com. The film can be of any genre (comedy, film noir, romance, horror, action, etc.), the idea is to be creative with the themes and come up with a great story!

Deadline: 26th of January.

Win a total cash prize of INR 15 000, a complete fee waiver at workshops organised by The Storygraphers and a chance to feature in one of their short films.

Register at: www.springfest.in

#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and MRF Tyres present the first act of our Global Music Festival - Oskar Stenmark from Sweden in association with Sweden in India. 
The musician specializes in trumpet and flugelhorn, is also a composer and educator in brass instruments. Oskar has done a number of shows in New York & Europe and now plans to come all the way to India to amaze the crowd of Spring Fest 2018.

Stay tuned as Spring Fest unfolds its Global Music Festival, announcing more international musical acts.

#GlobalMusicFestival
#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur and WBSEDCL (Govt. of West Bengal Enterprise) presents A Mighty Pen, a journalism-based event in association with Kolkata Bloggers and Write India Publishers.

Pen down your thoughts to bring about a change in society and shape perspectives. Prizes up for grabs include a Cash Prize of INR 10,000 and an additional chance to avail:
1. Internship opportunities from the Kolkata Bloggers
2. Certification and a course on journalism from Write India Publishers with a wall frame as prize and award

For more details head over to https://springfest.in/AMightyPen.pdf
Submission deadline: 10th January 2018
Register at: https://springfest.in
Design: Kushagra Ramnani

message:
Spring Fest,the annual social and cultural fest of IIT Kharagpur is always one of the most awaited events for youngsters all across the nation. During the 3 days of the fest we immerse ourselves in the fun and frolic letting go of all the worries of our mundane lives. As the final countdown to the 59th edition of the fest to be held from 26th to 28nd of January, 2018 begins, we present to you the official aftermovie of the previous edition.

 So as you go through the glimpses of Spring Fest 2017- Bollywood Boulevard, mark your calendars,make your plans and get ready for Spring Fest 2018 as we begin the countdown for this edition being only 30 days away!

Register yourself at https://springfest.in/

#30DaysLeft
#SpringFest2018
#AfterMovie_BollywoodBoulevard

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JD6zaBhSYrc

With Christmas around the corner, Santa has already begun his preparations to make it merrier! 
How are you planning to spend this extended weekend?

#MerryChristmas
#SpringFest2018

Spring Fest, IIT Kharagpur presents Poetry Slam in association with Poetry Darbaar and with a cash prize of INR 20,000 along with other exciting prizes and gifts.

So if you have a thing for poetry, you can mail us a link to a short recital of your original poetry at literary.sf18@gmail.com before the 5th of January 2018 to take part in the online prelims for Poetry Slam.

Stay tuned for further updates on the events.
